alert.note: Alert for Clark; Jefferson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN CLARK... OLDHAM...TRIMBLE AND NORTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM EDT... At 1030 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Vernon to 8 miles northwest of Prospect. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, La Grange, Bedford, Pendleton, Charlestown, Hanover, Saluda, Smyrna, Owen and Goshen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
